      • removeFacility

        public void removeFacility(int ID)
        Removes facility from the facility table, facility_detail table, and use table.
        Parameters:
        ID - of facility to be removed

      • getFacilityInformation

        public Facility getFacilityInformation(int ID)
        Returns detail information about a facility, including its name, facility ID, number of rooms, and a phone number if it's listed.
        Parameters:
        ID - of facility
        Returns:
        facility detail information

      • addNewFacility

        public void addNewFacility(Facility fac)
        Add a new facility to the facility table and details about the facility to facility_detail table. Must create a new facility object before running addNewFacility method.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility object to be added to the database

      • addFacilityDetail

        public void addFacilityDetail(int ID,
                              int phoneNumber)
        Adds optional detail information (phone number) about the facility
        Parameters:
        ID - facility ID
        phoneNumber - number to be added
